required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate GBT021601 in Single and Multiple Doses in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Single and Multiple Ascending Dose (SAD/MAD) Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, PK, and Food Effect of GBT021601, a Hemoglobin S Polymerization Inhibitor, in Healthy Participants.

brief_summary.textblock: This first in human study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK), and food effect of GBT021601, a hemoglobin S (HbS) polymerization inhibitor, in healthy participants.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled, single and multiple ascending dose study in healthy participants.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by frequency and severity of adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
primary_outcome.description: AEs will be coded to system organ class and preferred term using the Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities (MedDRA) and summarized.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by changes in Heart Rate.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with changes in heart rate (bpm) as compared to baseline.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by changes in eGFR
primary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with changes in eGFR from baseline

primary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by changes in alanine aminotransferase (ALT)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with changes in alanine aminotransferase (ALT)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by changes in Blood pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with changes in systolic (mmHg) and diastolic (mmHg) blood

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine whole blood concentration of GBT021601
secondary_outcome.description: Hemoximetry will be used to assess oxygen saturation in whole blood by generating oxygen equilibrium curves (OECs) which relate the extent of Hb-O2 saturation to the partial pressure of O2 (pO2) and measure the binding affinity of O2 to Hb.
With dosing data from each cohort determine the steady-state maximum plasma/whole blood concentration (Cmax).

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety, as assessed by changes in QTcF
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 119 days from screening Part A, 134 days from screening Part B
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with changes in the QTcF interval from baseline

arm_group.description: Placebo as a tablet or capsule with dose based off of preceding cohort's data.
GBT021601 as a tablet or capsule with dose based off of preceding cohort's data.

intervention.description: Administered orally with water as a single dose in the morning.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy males and females ≥ 18 to ≤ 55 years of age
- Body mass index ≥ 18.0 to ≤ 30.0 kg/m2
- Body weight ≥ 50 kg at screening and Day -1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Positive pregnancy test or currently breastfeeding.
